contacts.importError: There was an error trying to import the contact.

errors.importUnavailable: The contact import feature is only available on physical devices.

panic.title: Panic Button
panic.instructionText: Press the button below and help will arrive soon.
panic.toastActivated: Panic alert activated. Sending emergency signal....
panic.alertDeactivatedMessage: The panic alert was deactivated after {{seconds}} seconds. Is everything okay?
panic.shareLocationMessage:
Your current location: {{coords}}.
Approximate address: {{address}}.

Do you want to share this location with your emergency contacts?
panic.locationErrorMessage: Could not retrieve your location. Check permissions.
panic.smsEmergencyMessage:
I'm in danger! I need help immediately. This is my current location: 
{{link}}
panic.smsFailToast: The SMS alert could not be sent.
panic.smsCancelMessage: Sorry! It was a false alarm, I'm safe. I'll call you later.
panic.smsCancelToast: False alarm notice sent to your contacts.
panic.smsSafeMessage: I’m safe! Help has arrived and I’m out of danger now.
panic.smsSafeToast: Safety confirmation sent to your contacts.
panic.smsLocationToast: Location shared with your emergency contacts.

share.title: Share Evidence
share.subtitle: Choose how you want to share the evidence

share.shareMessage: I’m in danger and need help. Check this evidence.
